com.ipt.ebsa.manage.deploy.impl.report

Class CompositeReleaseReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ipt.ebsa.manage.deploy.impl.report.Report
      • com.ipt.ebsa.manage.deploy.impl.report.CompositeReleaseReport

  • public class CompositeReleaseReport
extends Report
    This provides a report of the actions which will be taken by the CompositeReleaseDeploymentEngine.
